extendedInfo.description: MoboPlayer Codec for ARM V6Just Plugin. You must install MoboPlayer First.Please DO NOT install this, if MoboPlayer works well. Thanks.

reviews.comment: Shite. Feels like groundhog day. Download then boot player. Which tells me to download codex. Then boot player. Which tells me to download codex...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: MoboPlayer won\'t recognize that this CODEC is installed, so keeps asking me to download it again. Doesn\'t work at all. No response from dev. FAIL!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Useless. Always says to download codecs, after already did. NO SUPPORT, EITHER
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: We are aware you have to install MoboPlayer first.  This is the codec it says our phones need.  The codec says it has installed, but on running MP again, it still says we need the codec.  Maybe you should learn to read as well.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: FOR EVERYONE\'S INFORMATION. 1. \'Retard\' is rude, ignorant, and hurtful to the mentally challenged 2. We ARE d/l-ing the codec 2nd...it DOES NOT WORK

reviews.comment: Well,it make\'s it work. Don\'t leave bad comment\'s,just open mobo player.then choose install coded from market.install and open original mobo player

reviews.title: Need codec forever
reviews.comment: HTC Hero.  The player app always asks for this codec forever. Reinstall this armv6 codec hundred times but still the same. Suck!
